title: WSEK: Warptorio + Space Exploration + Krastorio
name: WSEK
author: AivanF
description:
Merges W2 with SE + K2: sometimes you will get teleported onto planets from Space Exploration universe! And many balance fixes to make it playable :)

See optional dependencies for a list of recommended mods. By the way, Factorissimo buildings are cheaper here!

WARNING: it's really early draft version, balance is not fully corrected yet, in case of problems or suggestions, reach me on Discord.
